column4: if i install the kde (kubuntu) and kfce (xubuntu) desktops in ubuntu, is that pretty much the same as the full install of those, or not really
full install of the desktop, yes
Thanks. I mean like if I installed kubuntu on another machine, and on this machine with ubuntu but i sign on with the kubuntu desktop, its the same features and programs?
ubuntu is the packaged OS, the desktop gnome/kde/xfce are seperate
